aws_cognito_identity_provider.description: Provides a Cognito User Identity Provider resource.

provider_type.description: - The provider type.  [See AWS API for valid values](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cognito-user-identity-pools/latest/APIReference/API_CreateIdentityProvider.html#CognitoUserPools-CreateIdentityProvider-request-ProviderType)

attribute_mapping.description: - The map of attribute mapping of user pool attributes. [AttributeMapping in AWS API documentation](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cognito-user-identity-pools/latest/APIReference/API_CreateIdentityProvider.html#CognitoUserPools-CreateIdentityProvider-request-AttributeMapping)

provider_details.description: - The map of identity details, such as access token
